title: Comic Cons
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 2,059 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1190L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     X and Z1
description: Fans of pop culture love the colorful and crowded worlds discovered at comic conventions. Comic Cons provides students with a detailed look into these gatherings of comic enthusiasts. The book can also be used to teach students how to distinguish between fact and opinion and use plural nouns. The book and lesson are also available for levels X and Z1.
meta: censorship, controversy, conventions, diversity, fandom, memoirs, merchandise, panel, pop culture, readership, screenings, venues
Fact or Opinion : Determine whether a detail is a fact or an opinion
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
